Lo que más alegra la vida de Nora es saber que ella genera sus propios recursos, junto con su tienda llegan varios sueños y metas pro cumplir una de ellas es comprar tienda, educarse profesionalmente, mejorar su ventas, ampliar su local y por ultimo aumentar sus clientes.
Nora trabaja diariamente desde la formalidad para atender un cliente, hasta identificar fallas en su negocio para acercarse un paso más de la larga meta.
Solicita un préstamo para comprar surtido de abarrotes, granos, como lo son mantequilla, panela, arroz, frijol, pastas, sal, azúcar, aceite entro otros.
texts.en:
Nora is a 37 year old woman with a great future ahead of her.  Although she is in a relationship, she does not have children.  Thanks to her store, she is able to be financially independent and she does not need anyone to put food on her table.  What makes Nora the happiest is knowing that she is able to make her own money.  Through her store, she has many dreams and goals to accomplish, which include purchasing the store, going to college, improving her sales, expanding her store, and increasing her clientele. Nora works everyday doing everything from serving her customers to identifying shortcomings in her business so that she can get closer to reaching her largest goals.

She is applying for a loan to purchase an assortment of groceries such as butter, brown sugar, rice, beans, pasta, salt, sugar, oil, etc.

loans.use: purchase an assortment of groceries, such as butter, brown sugar, rice, beans, pasta, salt, sugar, oil, etc.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente es un hombre de 32 años de edad esta simplemente unido de hecho con su esposa, vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Vicente día a día se esmera bajo el sol para darle a su familia lo mejor gracias al crédito anterior el logro que su negocio de venta de  jaspeado mejorara y su clientela se siente satisfecho porque ahora ya les ofrece una variedad   de estilos y colores, también el ingreso de su familia ha mejorado, entonces él ahora está enfocado en otras necesidades que su familia  tiene, y  una de las más prioritarias es la construcción de una cocina porque lamentablemente su familia no cuenta con un lugar apropiado donde prepara los alimentos, pero una de las limitaciones que Vicente tiene es que no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para poder hacerlo por tal motivo él solicita un préstamo para comprar los materiales de construcción tales como: arena, cemento, bloc, cal, hierro y piedrín.
El sueño de Vicente es poder contar nuevamente con este préstamo y así poder darle a su familia una mejor lugar donde se pueda preparar los alimentos sanamente, y seguir haciendo mejorar en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Vicente is a 32 year old man, he is in a common law relationship with his wife, and lives in a community of Sololá. He works every day under the sun to give his family the best. Thanks to the previous loan he managed to improve his business selling jaspeado (special yarn used for traditional dress) and his customers are satisfied because he now offers them a variety of styles and colours.

In addition the income of his family has improved, so he is now focused on other needs his family has, and one of the top priorities is the construction of a kitchen because sadly the family does not have an appropriate place to prepare meals. One of the limitations Vicente has is that he does not have sufficient money to do this, and so he is asking for a loan to buy the construction materials like cement, breeze blocks, lime, iron and gravel.

Vicente's dream is to be able to rely again on this loan and thus give his family a better place to prepare food healthily, and continuing to improve his house.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, breeze blocks and iron.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria works hard to support her family. Victoria is married and has a purified drinking water business in the Philippines.

Victoria requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more containers of purified drinking water to sell.

Victoria has been in this business for six years now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Victoria would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more containers of purified drinking water to sell

loans.name: Diego Luis

texts.es:
Diego es un hombre de 51 años de edad, le gusta la independencia, el deporte, es muy trabajador y honesto, tiene un almacén de ropa, donde oferta ropa casual, como camisetas tipo polo, jeans de dama y de hombre, blusas, pijamas, esta actividad la adopto a mediados del año 2014 como necesidad económica y como siempre le ha gustado manejar sus tiempos, ser su propio jefe monto su negocio.
Aprendió de la actividad gracias a un amigo quien le ofreció pro varios años un empleo como vendedor de almacén pero al no ser conformista ahorro todo ese tiempo y ahora tiene su propio negocio.
Diego es padre de un pequeño de 16 años de edad y es su hijo quien lo motiva a crecer a soñar con comprar una vivienda, pagarle la universidad, superarse, creerse que es el mejor negocio del barrio.
Diego solicita un préstamo para la compra  de surtido totalmente nuevo de ropa, quiere comprar camisetas tipo polo, camisas, jeans, blusas surtidas de colores, abrigos.
texts.en:
Diego is a 51 year old man, he likes independence, sport, and is very hard working and honest. He owns a clothing store where he sells casual clothing such as polo shirts, mens and womens jeans, blouses and pyjamas. He began this during 2014 out of economic necessity and as he had always liked to manage his own time and be his own boss he began his business.

He learned this activity thanks to a friend who offered him a job as a shopworker for several years, but not being conformist, he saved up all that time and now has his own business.

Diego is father to a 16 year old boy, and it is his son who motivates him to grow, to dream of buying a house, to pay for his university, to succeed and believe that he is the best business in the area.

Diego is asking for a loan to buy a totally new selection of clothing, he wants to buy polo shirts, shirts, jeans, assorted coloured blouses and coats.

loans.use: to buy a totally new selection of clothing, he wants to buy polo shirts, shirts, jeans, assorted coloured blouses and coats.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 42 years old and has three children. She is married, and two of her children are currently in school.

Jocelyn is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Jocelyn has been in pig fattening for five years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Jocelyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Meris Del Carmen

texts.es:
Meris es un dulce y adorable abuelita de 62 años de edad, con un gran corazón y sobretodo muy centrada y preocupada por su hogar, ella cuida de los nietos de sus 4 hijos y como le gusta que ellos tengan lo mejor en su hogar tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de productos de uso personal como lo son desodorantes, talcos, alcohol antiséptico, algodón y algunos productos para realizar manicura y pedicura.
Su mayor sueño es ver crecer a su familia feliz contenta sin pasar necesidades y en ello trabaja todos los días.
Solicita un préstamo para comprar los productos anteriormente mencionados y abastecer su pequeña estantería.
texts.en:
Meris is a sweet and lovely 62 year old grandmother.  She has a big heart and above all else, she is very centered and concerned about the wellbeing of her household.  She cares for her grandchildren from her four children.  Since she wants them to have the best in life, she has a small business in her home where she sells personal products such as deodorants, talcs, rubbing alcohol, and cotton as well as products for manicures and pedicures.  

Meris's biggest dream is to see her family grow to be happy and content with out needing for anything.  She works towards this goal everyday.  She is seeking a loan to purchase the aforementioned products so that she can stock her small store.

loans.use: purchase deodorant, talcs, rubbing alcohol, and cotton, as well as products for manicures and pedicures.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a gas stove, a baster, utensils, and supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and better satisfy his clientele.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to fix his vehicle.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María Elena es una mujer de admirar, su perseverancia y capacidad de superar las adversidades ha sido símbolo de fuerza y esperanza para su familia, por circunstancias de la vida quedo Viuda a cargo de 5 hijos de 19, 18, 16, 15, y 12 años de edad una etapa complicada que requiere mucho del cuidado de ella para que no se les desvíen por el mal camino. 
María Elena gracias a una carnicera logra generar el sustento para su familia vende carne de cerdo de res y pollo. 
Al tener una gran responsabilidad con sus 5 hijos en ocasiones no le queda capital para invertir en su negocio pues el estudio de sus hijos es algo primordial para María Elena. 
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de una vaca y dos cerdos, para su carnicería, es una mujer que vale la pena ayudar pues sola ha levantado su hogar con 5 hijos.
texts.en:
María Elena is a woman to admire. Her perseverance and ability to overcome adversity have been a symbol of strength and hope for her family. Life’s circumstances left her a widow in charge of 5 children, ages 19, 18, 16, 15, and 12—complicated ages that require great care on her part to keep them from straying onto the wrong path.

María Elena manages to earn a livelihood for her family thanks to her butcher shop, where she sells pork, beef, and chicken.

As she has a great responsibility with her five children, she sometimes lacks the capital to invest in her business, because for María Elena, her children’s educations are paramount. 

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of a cow and two pigs for her butcher shop. She is a woman worth helping, as she has supported her home and five children on her own.

loans.use: to purchase a cow and two pigs for her butcher shop.

loans.name: Bark Wenaam2 Group

texts.fr: Djénéba est la responsable du groupe Bark Wenaam2. Elle est mariée et mère de 3 enfants tous scolarisés. Elle est restauratrice depuis 6 ans maintenant. Elle propose des menus diversifiés à sa clientèle,donc elle à besoin de ce crédit pour renforcer son restaurant. Djénéba ambitionne embaucher quelqu'un pour l'aider dans la gestion de son restauration dans l'avenir. A l'aide de son activité, elle arrive à faire certaines dépenses de ses enfants. Après tous les remboursements, elle pourrait avoir un bénéfice qui lui permettra de continuer son activité et de soutenir sa famille.
texts.en:
Djeneba is the leader of group Bark Wenaam2. She is married and the mother of three school-going children.

She has run a restaurant for six years now. She offers varied menus to her clientele, and needs this loan to build up her restaurant. In the future, Djeneba's ambition is to hire someone to help her manage the restaurant.

Thanks to her business, she can pay for some of her children’s expenses. After repaying her loan entirely, she would still have a profit that would allow her to continue her business and to support her family.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, and condiments for her restaurant's lunch preparation.

loans.name: Georgette Myriam

texts.fr: Myriamest une femmme de 41 ans, mère de famille. Elle est commercante dans un marché de la capitale ou elle gère un petit restaurant ouvert par elle même depuis 02 ans déjà. C'est grace à cette activité qu'elle subvient aux besoins de sa famille. elle sollicite ce crédit pour augmenter le stock de produits de première necessité pour pouvoir diversifier ses plats. Ceci augmentera non seulement ses ventes mais aussi son bénéfice. Benéfice qui sera réinvesti non seulement dans son activité pour l'aggrandir son activité.
texts.en: Myriame is a 41 year old woman and a mother. She is a merchant at a market in the capital where she manages a small restaurant that she opened 2 years ago. She provides for her family's needs thanks to her business. She is requesting this loan to increase her stock of essential products in order to be able to diversify her dishes. This will increase not only her sales but her profits as well. This profit will be reinvested into increasing her business.

loans.use: to increase and diversify the stock of essential products.

loans.name: John Jairo

texts.es:
Juventud, soltería, ganas de trabajar, el querer progresar, estudiar, son varios aspectos que tiene a favor el señor John que a sus 24 años de edad, logro montar con esfuerzo, ahorros y préstamos un negocio de tienda de abarrotes, con el cual genera el sustento para él y sus familiares, se paga su estudio y algunas cuentas de la casa.
John no para, él quiere que su negocio mejore, no quedarse como una tienda barrial, si no convertirse en un supermercado, ofreciendo más y mejores productos al alcance del bolsillo de la población.
Su idea es ampliarse para poner más estanterías y ofrecer mayor variedad, por eso solicita un préstamo para realizar algunas reformas locativas como lo son la ampliación, pintada y compra de estanterías y surtido.
texts.en:
A young man, single, with desire to work, he wants to progress and study. There are many things that work in favor for John, who is 24 years old. With his effort, savings, and loans, he succeeded in starting a grocery store business, with which he generates an income for him and his relatives. The income is used to pay for his studies and some household expenses.

John doesn’t stop. He wants his business to improve, and he doesn’t want it to remain a neighborhood store. Instead, he wants to convert it into a supermarket, offering more and better products that are affordable for the population.

His idea is to grow the business to install more shelves and to offer a bigger variety. Thus, he requests a loan to make some on-site changes, including increasing, painting, and buying shelves and supply.

loans.use: to make some on-site changes, including increasing, painting, and buying shelves and supply

loans.name: Sukkhuon

texts.en:
Sukkhuon, 46, lives in the Kampong Cham Province of Cambodia. She has four children. To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business. She has a small rice farmland that is located in her community. She has been in this business for thirty years. 

Sukkhuon has requested a Kiva loan through HKL to buy a motorbike. A personal vehicle will give her a convenient way to travel. She would like to thank all her lenders for their financial support. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy threads and accessories for tailoring that he resells to his clients.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 40 years old. She is married and has six children. Four of her children are currently in school.

Jocelyn has been farming flowers in the Philippines for the last five years. She has borrowed nine times from NWTF so far to sustain it. She currently needs a PHP 16,000 loan to purchase fertilizer and other supplies for the farm.

In the future, Jocelyn would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and other supplies

loans.name: Lanie

texts.en:
Lanie is 27 years old, and a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Six of her children are currently in school. She has a manicure/pedicure service business in the Philippines she has operated for the last four years. 

Lanie has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more materials, such as nail polish, nippers, and other supplies for her business. In the future, she would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her business.

loans.name: Yasmid Milena

texts.es:
Yasmid una joven muy creativa, trabajadora, ella es entregada a su familia, verla realizando su labor es de admirar, el empeño y la dedicación que pone en cada una de sus actividades ha sido la clave de su éxito, se dedica a la producción de leche, tiene su ganado e inicio su empresa por gusto, un poco de necesidad y aprendiendo empíricamente.
Ella es madre de 5 hijos una gran responsabilidad  todos ellos menores de edad y como sabe lo difícil que ha sido su vida en términos laborales no quiere que sus hijos pasen por esas situaciones y trabaja duro para que estudien y sean unos profesionales.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de dos vacas en periodo de producción esto tiene una razón y para las personas que no saben al ser un mamífero solo da leche cuando se encuentra en embarazo. 
El monto es considerable debido a que las vacas en este estado son muy costosas, con estas dos vacas duplicara su producción y tendrá mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Yasmid is a young woman, who is very creative and hard working. She is dedicated to her family. Seeing her do her work is to admire her. The determination and dedication that she puts into each one of her activities has been the key to her success. She is dedicated to producing milk. She has her livestock and started her business for pleasure and a little for necessity, and she is learning by doing.

She is the mother of 5 children, which is a big responsibility. All of her children are young, and knowing how difficult her life has been with short-term jobs, she doesn’t want her children to go through these situations. She works hard so that they study and become professionals.

She requests a loan to buy two pregnant cows. This makes sense, and for the people who don’t know, mammals (cows included) only produce milk when they are pregnant. 

The amount of the loan is large because cows in this state are very expensive. With these two cows, she will double her production and will have better income.

loans.use: to buy two pregnant cows.

loans.name: Djiguiya Group

texts.fr: L’homme qui tient la corde du brebis en main est monsieur Seri. IL est Malien,  âgé de 52 ans. Marié à une  ménagère et père  de 4 enfants,  âgés de 4 à 16 ans, dont  2 sont scolarisés. Seri  n’ayant pas été à l’école, il  élève des moutons, il exerce cette activité depuis 5 ans. Il souhaite dans l’avenir de travailler dans son propre  compte c’est-à-dire avoir plus de profit pour soutenir son élevage. Il fait recourt à I M F pour avoir de l’argent pour acheter beaucoup de moutons. Il s’approvisionne sur le marché sur  place dans son village et revend ses animaux dans le même marché. Les bénéfices dont il réalise lui permettent  de subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants (frais scolaires, frais médicaux et habillements des enfants et madame). Il aime l’embouche car il gagne dans cette activité.
texts.en:
The man holding the ewe’s rope in his hand is mister Seri. He is a 52-year-old Malian. He is married to a stay-at-home wife and has four children between the ages of four and sixteen. Two of the children currently go to school.

Seri, who did not go to school, fattens sheep. He has been in this business for five years. In the future, he would like to work for himself, thus making a greater profit with which to sustain his animal husbandry operation. He turns towards the IMF for money with which to buy many sheep. He procures them locally at the village market, and resells them at the same market.

The profit he makes allows him to provide for his children’s needs (school expenses, healthcare, clothing) and for his wife’s. He likes animal husbandry because it turns a profit.

loans.use: to buy sheep to raise and resell.

loans.name: Donelia

texts.es:
Donelia es una campesina de 42 años de edad, muy inquieta, trabajadora, entregada al campo y a su esposo, gracias a sus padres aprendió del negocio, el cual trabaja desde que se levanta hasta que se acuesta, alimentándolos, limpiando constantemente las cocheras, algo que tiene las personas del campo es un conocimiento empírico para hacer negocios, ella quiere aumentar su utilidad, crecer como empresa, llegar a más personas.
Donelia solicita un préstamo para comprar 10 lechones, comprar alimento y algunos materiales para reparar sus cocheras que están en muy mal estado.
texts.en: Donelia lives in the countryside and is 42 years old. She is very restless, hardworking, and dedicated to the countryside and to her husband. She learned her business thanks to her parents, and she works from the time she gets up until the time she goes to sleep, feeding her pigs and cleaning the pens constantly. Something that people in the countryside have is empirical knowledge of how to do business. Donelia wants to increase her utility, grow as a business, and reach more people. She is asking for a loan to buy 10 piglets, food and some materials to repair her pens that are in very bad condition.

loans.use: to buy 10 piglets, food and some materials to repair her pens that are in very bad condition.

loans.name: Benkan Group

texts.fr:
La dame qui a les pagnes en main sur la photo est kiatou qui vend les pagnes.
Kiatou est une Malienne âgée de 39 ans, mariée mère de 2 enfants, âgés de  15 et 10 ans, tous vont à l’école. Elle est mariée à un paysan  qui exerce aussi le commerce pendant la saison sèche et cultive pendant l’hivernage. Kiatou fait le commerce de pagnes dans son village. Elle exerce  cette activité depuis plus de 8 ans. Elle emprunte avec le RMCR pour acheter beaucoup de marchandises( les  pagnes) ; Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché en pagnes et les revend au  marché local de sa commune. Elle veut faire croitre son revenu mensuel pour pouvoir subvenir aux  besoins familiaux notamment sur le plan de la santé, la scolarité des enfants. Kiatou compte mettre tout son amour pour un investissement judicieux des fonds reçus de RMCR. Le problème auquel  elle est confrontée est parfois l’évacuation très lente de ses marchandises elle arrive a s’en sortir bien.
texts.en:
The lady with dresses in her hands in the photo is Kiatou, the dress seller. Kiatou is a 39-year-old Malian. She is married and has two children aged fifteen and ten, who both go to school. She is married to a farmer who cultivates the land during the rainy season and trades during the dry season.

Kiatou sells dresses in her village. She has been in this business for over eight years. She is borrowing from RMCR to purchase a large quantity of merchandise (the dresses). She procures her dresses from the central market and resells them locally at the town’s village market. She wants to increase her monthly revenues to provide for her family, in particular for healthcare needs and for her children’s school expenses.

Kiatou plans to put all her care in judiciously investing the funds received from RMCR. She sometimes encounters the difficulty of her merchandise selling very slowly, but she always come out of it ahead.

loans.use: to buy dresses for resale.

loans.name: Yuly Andrea

texts.es:
Comprar 30 gallinas ponedoras, mejorar el corral, ampliarlo para que se sientan más cómodas son los motivos que hoy la joven Yuly, quien con su actividad económica de venta de huevos trata de generar el sustento para su hogar, tiene la responsabilidad de mantener a sus dos hijos que tan solo tienen 2 y 4 años de edad, con esta inversión espera obtener los siguientes beneficios; aumentar sus clientes, incrementar su utilidad o ganancia, lograr una estabilidad para sostener su negocio, ampliar su negocio y aspira a seguir mejorando pero ira paso a paso. 
Su sueño es poder comprar una vivienda para vivir tranquilamente junto con sus hijos y pareja.
texts.en:
To buy 30 laying hens, to improve the corral, and to increase the corral so that the animals feel more comfortable are the goals of Yuly, the young woman. With her work selling eggs, she tries to generate income for her household. She has the responsibility supporting her two children, who are only 2 and 4 years old. 

With this investment, she hopes to obtain the following benefits: to increase her clients, to improve her usefulness and earnings, to succeed in stability for sustaining her business, to grow her business, and to continue improving. She will go step by step.

Her dream is to be able to buy a house in which to live peacefully with her children and partner.

loans.use: to by 30 laying hens and improve the corral.

loans.name: Las Hermanas De Gran Puni Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS HERMANAS DE GRAN PUNI” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Achacachi, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Alicia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de pescado y servicio de construcción.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Alicia es integrante, ella indica que hace tres años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promoción masiva de la institución que realizaron en su zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de pescado; da a conocer que este negocio aprendió de sus padres, ya que desde niña trabaja con este negocio, recuerda que inicio con dos redes muy gastadas, ya que no tenía dinero para comprar más y con el tiempo amplio su herramienta de trabajo.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de redes) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de su comunidad y posteriormente lo implementará en su espacio de trabajo. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene nueve hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los beneficios que ofrece la institución.

En la imagen se encuentra ausente una de las cliente, misma que se marcho con premura a cuidar su ganado.
texts.en:
The communal bank “LAS HERMANAS DE GRAN PUNI” will begin its second cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the regional hub of Achacachi. The group is made up of nine members and is run by an executive board where Alicia is the President. The businesses that the group's members carry out are varied and among them are: fish sales and construction services.

The loan they will take out will benefit small microenterprises where Alicia is a member. Alicia joined Pro Mujer three years ago, joining by the invitation of a mass promotion the institution carried out in her zone. She currently has a fish selling business. She learned this business from her parents and has worked in it since she was a young girl. She remembers starting with two very worn-out nets since she did not have money to buy more and in time she expanded her work tools.

The loan that she will take out now is to increase capital (buy nets) that she will acquire from the wholesale sellers in her community and later she will implement it in her workspace. This form of work allows her to generate resources to support her family economically. She is married and has nine children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replies that she likes the benefits that the institution offers.

In the photo one member is absent, the one who departed with urgency to care for her cattle.

loans.use: to buy nets.

loans.name: Las Productivas De Pomamaya Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS PRODUCTORAS DE POMAMAYA” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Copacabana, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Ninfa es la Secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de ganado, servicio de transporte, venta de comida, venta de leche.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Ninfa es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promoción masiva de la institución que realizaron en su zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de leche; da a conocer que este negocio aprendió de sus padres, ya que desde niña trabaja con este producto, cuenta que hace cinco años su madre le regalo un ganado con el cual inicio su negocio independiente.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ganado y forraje por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de su comunidad y posteriormente a la crianza, realizará la elaboración de sus productos. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el ahorro y la capacitación que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The “Las Productoras de Pomomaya” group will begin its second cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the organization’s center focusing on Copacabana. The group is composed of eight members, and it is directed by a group of directors, in which Mrs. Ninfa is the Secretary. The businesses that the members of the group bring forward are varied; among them are: selling livestock, providing transportation services, selling food, and selling milk.

The loan that is taken will benefit small micro-entrepreneurs where Mrs. Ninfa is a member. She says that it has been a year since they joined Pro Mujer, and they were admitted based on an invitation from a massive promotion the institution did in their area. At present, she has a business selling milk. She came to know this business from her parents; since she was a child, she has worked with this product. It has been five years since her mother gave her the gift of livestock, with which she started her own business. 

The loan that she is now taking out is to increase capital to buy livestock and fodder wholesale, which she will acquire from the wholesale sellers in her community. She will raise the livestock and will make her products. This form of work allows her to generate resources to support her family financially, since she is married and has three children. 

When she was asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she said that she likes the savings and training the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy forage wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make a deposit on money-transfer services and to buy accessories for secretarial services.

loans.name: Guillerma

texts.en:
Guillerma, age 50, is happy tending her little store.  She is married with four children. Her husband is a motorcab driver. The store helps her earn a living to support her family.

Fortunately, the store is located in a populous neighborhood, and makes good daily sales, even though there is increased competition from other stores. Guillerma believes that with PMPC's support, as one family they will keep going and beat the competition. 

She has applied for a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy more inventory and increase stock. Expanding the inventory will bring additional income. 

Guillerma has reached her fourth year as a member of Paglaum MPC, and is confident she can maintain membership in good standing. She is a hardworking mother who wishes to sustain the store and provide better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory for her store.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is 65 years old and married with four children. She is in the pig-fattening business in the Philippines for ten years, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Lilia currently needs a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 20 years old, married, and has two children. She works very hard to provide for them. She has run a general store in the Philippines for the last two years.

Alma has requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock for sale, including canned goods, eggs, shampoo, beverages, groceries, and other items. In the future, she would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell.

loans.name: Lilian Patricia

texts.es:
Lilian una madre de 4 hijos los cuales tienen 15, 13,10 y 8 años de edad se encuentra muy preocupada dado que su pareja no da abasto para generar los recursos para mantenerlos tomo la decisión y busco la manera de montar su propio negocio, pues no puede descuidar su trabajo como ama de casa, y ya que sus hijos son menores de edad necesitan mucho de su cuidado y su amor. 
Con la ayuda de la corporación interactuar, junto con un préstamo que le desembolsara y con algunas asesorías montara en un espacio de su casa una tienda de productos de la canasta familiar.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido, las estanterías las hará manualmente con madera que le regalaron, compra granos y abarrotes para iniciar.
texts.en: Lilian is the mother of four children ages 15, 13, 10 and 8. She is very worried because her partner cannot generate the resources to support them. She made a decision and sought a way to open her own business, as she cannot neglect her work as a housewife; since her children are young they need a lot of her love and care. With the help of Corporación Interactuar, along with a loan she will be given and with some advising, she will open a store selling food in a space in her home. She is asking for a loan to buy an assortment of food. She will make shelves with wood she was given but needs to buy grains and groceries to start up.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of food. She will make shelves with wood she was given but needs to buy grains and groceries to start up.

loans.name: Yenis Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yenis es una joven de 22 años de edad que desea iniciar un negocio propio para poder alimentar a su hijo de 5 años, no dejarlo pasar necesidades y lo más importante volverlo a inscribir a estudiar ya que por problemas económicos no lo ha podido hacer. 
Yenis desea iniciar un negocio de moto-taxi, una actividad muy popular en la zona de turbo, donde solo motocicletas llegan a algunos lugares sea por el espacio o el caminos que algunos vehículos no pueden transitar.
Como apenas iniciara su negocio el monto de capital lo justifica con la compra de una motocicleta de segunda mano, modificada para aguantar los difíciles caminos. 
Con este negocio y tal cual como se dijo al inicio lo que busca es tener un medio de sustento para ella y su hijo.
texts.en:
Yenis is a young woman of 22 years who wants to start her own business in order to provide for her 5 year old child, to not let necessities pass by, and the most important, to re-enroll in school, since economic problems have prevented her from doing so. 

Yenis wants to start a motorcycle taxi service, a very popular business in the "turbo zone," where only motorcyclists can pass through spaces or roads that other vehicles cannot.

Since she just started the business, the principal amount justifies the purchase of a second-hand motorcycle, modified to withstand difficult roads.

With this business and as she said at the beginning, she hopes to have a way to support herself and her child.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle in order to offer transportation service.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre de 48 años de edad, vive en una comunidad de Sololá, Juan un padre de familia dedicado  con amor a su familia, él cuenta que gracias al préstamo anterior el logro comprar algunas puertas y ventanas, y una parte de su casa ya se encuentra en buenas condiciones, él se siente satisfecho porque ya le ofrece a su familia más seguridad, pero una parte de su casa un no cuenta con ventanas ni puertas pero como ellos tienen la necesidad de la vivienda hasta en este momento solo lo tienen tapado con lagunas cortinas, pero para Juan esta situación es bastante incomoda, es por eso que solicita un  nuevo préstamo  que lo utilizará para comprar el resto de puertas y ventanas que a su casa le hace falta.
El anhelo de Juan es poder contar con este préstamo y terminar de poner las puertas a su casa y ventanas para que su familia ya no pase penas también seguir ayudando a sus hijos en la escuela.
texts.en:
Juan is 48 years old, and he lives in a community in Sololá.  Juan is a loving and devoted father to his family.  

He says that thanks to the previous loan, he was able to purchase some doors and windows, and now part of his house is in good condition.  He feels satisfied because he is providing his family with more security now, but part of his house still doesn’t have windows or doors, which up to this moment, are only covered with long curtains, because they need the house. 

For Juan, this situation is too uncomfortable, so he is requesting a new loan that he will use to purchase the rest of the doors and windows that his house lacks.

Juan hopes to be able to count on this loan and finish putting doors and windows on his house so that his family will not have to suffer, and also to continue helping his children in school.

loans.use: to purchase doors and windows for his house.

loans.name: Angèle

texts.fr: Angèle est une femme de 46 ans, célibataire de 5 enfants de 4 à 18 ans. Elle est commerçante et a ouvert une petite alimentation qu'elle gère  depuis 10 ans. C'est grâce à elle qu'elle subvient aux besoins de sa famille. grâce à son accueil chaleureux et ses relations de bon voisinage, elle a conquis et fidélisé une clientèle qui s'accroit au fil du temps, et là, il ne parvient plus à la satisfaire totale d'où la nécessité de ce crédit dans son activité en ce moment parce qu'il lui permettra d'augmenter le stock des produits de première nécessité. Ceci augmentera ses ventes et donc son benéfice. benéfice qui sera réinvesti en partie dans son activité pour l'aggrandir.
texts.en:
Angèle is a 46-year-old woman, unmarried, with five children from 4 to 18 years old. She is a shopkeeper and has opened a small food market which she has been managing for ten years. It is thanks to this that she can meet the financial needs of her family. 

Thanks to her warmth and neighborliness, she has acquired and won the loyalty of an ever-growing clientele which is now too large for her to serve satisfactorily; hence the present need for this loan.It will allow her to increase her inventory of basic products. This will increase her sales and therefore her profits. A portion of the profits will be reinvested in her business in order to expand it.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of basic products

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge, de 46 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañado, su pareja es secretaria y tienen dos hijos.
	
Jorge, inicio a trabajar a la edad de 8 años, ayudando a su abuelo en la siembra de cultivos de frijol y maíz, gracias a él aprendió esta actividad.- Además, ha trabajado en otras actividades como motorista del transporte público durante 6 años, vigilante de seguridad durante 5 años y actualmente tiene 2 años de trabajar en la venta de mariscos, de esta actividad genera ingresos para sacar adelante a su familia. 

El crédito será invertido para comprar mariscos para vender.- De esta forma podrá tener la oportunidad de hacer crecer su negocio.

El sueño de Jorge, es que sus hijos puedan prepararse académicamente y puedan terminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Jorge is 46 years old and studied up to the ninth grade. He is in a relationship; his partner is a secretary and they have two children. Jorge started working at the age of eight, helping his grandfather plant beans and corn; he learned this business thanks to his grandfather. He has also worked in other business; he was a driver for public transportation for six years, a security guard for five years, and has now been selling shellfish for two years. With this business he generates income to get his family ahead. 

The loan will be invested in buying shellfish to sell. In this way he will be able to have the opportunity to make his business grow. Jorge's dream is that his children will be able to prepare themselves academically and finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy shellfish to sell

loans.name: Akou

texts.fr: Akou vit à Amadahomé et est agée de 38 ans. Elle est une femme mariée et habite avec ses trois enfants. Pour mieux subvenir aux besoins quotidiens qu’elle éprouve, Akou vend des chaussures et des sacs de sortie de bonne qualité afin d’avoir un revenu pouvant aider son mari dans les charges quotidiennes. Akou s’approvisionne  deux  fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé pour équiper son étalage. Akou demande ce prêt pour acheter des chaussures et sacs afin de tirer du bénéfice nécessaire pour relever ses défis et étendre son commerce.
texts.en: Akou lives in Amadahomé and is 38 years old. She is a married woman and lives with her three children. In order to better fulfill her daily needs, Akou sells high-quality shoes and shopping bags. This gives her an income that allows her to help her husband with daily responsibilities. Akou stocks up twice a month at the large market in Lomé to equip her stand. Akou is asking for this loan to buy shoes and bags in order to make a necessary profit to address her challenges and widen her business.

loans.use: to buy 14 packages of shoes and 7 shopping bags.

loans.name: Ines

texts.es:
Ines es una mujer de 38 años de edad, casada, sin hijos, y su negocio es el lavado de autos.
Ella es emprendedora, amable, paciente, amigable, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘Panamericana’ un área céntrica donde conviven empresas, restaurantes, departamento, universidades y todo tipo de comercio, de clima templado con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 18-26 grados centígrados.
Ines es de tez morena, cabello negro largo lo usa trenzado, ojos obscuros, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, viste de forma tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera), su lengua materna es el Quechua que habla en familia y habla español para el trabajo que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su esposo que trabaja en construcción, viven en una casa propia en las afueras de la ciudad construida de adobe con techo de calamina y cuenta con agua de pozo y electricidad. Su negocio es el lavado de autos manualmente; ella se encarga –con un balde y un trapo- de lavar la parte externa del vehículo, lava los vidrios con detergente, limpia las llantas con un cepillo y jabón, luego ingresa al vehículo y lava las alfombras de goma con agua, limpia y encera el tablero, tarda aproximadamente 45 minutos por vehiculo, labor que realiza todos los días de la semana durante el día. “inicie mi labor por iniciativa de mi prima, trabajo en un área comercial donde la competencia es constante…” comenta. Su sueño es tener su propio lavadero en un lugar fijo, ella desea realizar la compra de una compresora de aire para limpiar los interiores de los vehículos y aumentar su clientela. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 8 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Ines solicita un préstamo para la compra de una compresora de aire para limpiar los interiores de vehículos y aumentar su clientela.
texts.en:
Ines is a 38-year-old woman. She is married, has no children, and her business is washing cars.

She is enterprising, kind, patient, friendly, responsible, and hard working. Her business is located in the “Panamericana” area, which is a cental area where many companies, restaurants, administrative offices, universities, and all types of business are located. The area has a temperate climate, with a temperature that varies during the day between 18 and 26 degrees Celsius.

Ines has brown skin, long black hard that she wears braided, dark eyes, short stature, and a thin physique. She wears traditional clothing (hat, blanket, skirt). Her mother tongue is Quechua, which she speaks with her family, and she speaks Spanish for her work. She shares her life with her husband, who works in construction. They live in their own house in the outskirts of the city; the house is built from adobe with a corrugated iron roof, and it has well water and electricity. 

Her business is washing cars by hand. She is responsible for—with a bucket and cloth—washing the outside of the car. She washes the glasses with detergent, and she cleans the tires with a brush and soap. Next, she enters the car and washes the rubber mats with water, and she cleans and waxes the dashboard. It takes her about 45 minutes per car. She does this work every day of the week during the day. She says that she started this work by her own initiative and that she works in a commercial area, where the competition is constant. 

Her dream is to have her own carwash in a fixed location. She wants to buy an air compressor to clean the interiors of the vehicles and to increase her clientele. This is her first sequence of loans with the institution in the 8 years that she has been doing this work.

It is for these reasons that Ines requests a loan to buy an air compressor to clean the interiors of vehicles and to increase her clientele.

loans.use: to buy an air compressor to clean the interiors of vehicles and to increase her clientele.

loans.name: Faustina

texts.es:
La  señora Faustina de 68 años de edad, vive con su esposo, en la aldea puerto grande al sur de Honduras, se dedica a la  pesca artesanal desde que era niña,  su ventas son en San Lorenzo y aldeas vecinas a La zona, donde llegan las personas de diferentes lugares para comprar su producto.
Doña Faustina solicita el préstamo para comprar de pescados  como tilapia, robalo, curbina, etc. Y  así tener mejores ganancias, ya que en estos primeros mese del año es cuando hay bastante demanda de pescado.
Con el apoyo de este préstamo  desea seguir invirtiendo en su negocio y seguir creciendo y a su vez obtener las ganancias necesarias que le permitan seguir adelante con su familia. 
Su sueño es que en su próximo credito mejorar mas su negocio y vivienda.

San Lorenzo, Honduras –Enero del 2015
texts.en:
Faustina is 68 years old. She lives with her husband in the small town of Puerto Grande in the South of Honduras. Faustina has worked in traditional fishing since she was a young girl. She sells in San Lorenzo and towns neighboring the zone where people come from different places to buy her product. 

Faustina requests the loan to buy fish like tilapia, sea bass, curbina, etc. and in that way have better earnings, since these first months of the year are when there is a lot of demand for fish. With the help of this loan she wishes to continue investing in her business and to continue growing and at the same time obtain the needed earnings to allow her family to get ahead. Her dream is that with her next loan she will improve her business and her home.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – January 2015

loans.use: to buy tilapia, sea bass, curbina, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Doris Alicia

texts.es:
La  Señora Doris de 42  años de edad  vive con su esposa en su casa de habitación ubicada en una  aldea de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras,  se dedica al negocio que es compra y venta de pescado desde  que es una niña.
 Doña Doris sus clientes son amigos y  vecinos de su comunidad que la visitan a diario para comprarle su producto que es de muy buena calidad, está solicitando el préstamo para compra de pescado como curvina, robalo, tilapias, etc. Espera que esta inversión le permita obtener los ingresos necesarios para salir adelante con su familia.
Su sueño es  mejorar más sus ingresos en su vivienda.

San Lorenzo, Valle - Enero del 2015
texts.en:
Señora Doris is 42 years old, lives with her wife in their house, which is located in the village of San Lorenzo, in southern Honduras. She has made her living in a business that buys and sells fish since she was a little girl.

Doña Doris's clients are friends and neighbors in the community who visit her daily to buy her high-quality product. She is asking for this loan in order to buy fish such as corvina, sea bass, tilapia, etc. She hopes that this investment will allow her to obtain the necessary income to move forward with her family. 

Her dream is to improve her income and her home.

San Lorenzo, Valle - January 2015

loans.use: to buy corvina, sea bass, tilapia, etc, for her store.

loans.name: 1 De Mayo Group

texts.es:
El comité se llama 1° de marzo están en el primer ciclo con 18 integrantes,  todas son mujeres emprendedoras y con deseos de superación. Son mujeres jefas de familia que se unieron para poder ayudar a sus familias y a sus seres queridos.
Entre ellas se destaca a la Sra. Ninfa  por su esfuerzo, se dedica a las ventas, cuenta con una despensa en su propia casa en donde ofrece todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad. Cada día va mejorando su negocio debido al esfuerzo y lucha que hace.
Ninfa pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para su despensa, como ser verduras, carne, panificados, lácteos y otros, de manera a poder seguir con su lucha y sacrificio.
texts.en:
The committee named “1° de Marzo” (March 1st) is in its first loan cycle with 18 members. All of the members are enterprising women who have the drive to succeed. These female heads of household have joined together so that they can help their families and loved ones.

One woman who stand out in this group is Sra. Ninfa. She puts her effort into generating sales. Ninfa has a food pantry in her home where she offers all types of basic necessity products. Each day her business is improving as a result of her efforts and determination.

Ninfa is requesting a loan in order to buy products for her food pantry such as vegetables, meat, baked goods, dairy products, and other items. As a result, she can continue forward with determination and sacrifice.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, baked goods, dairy products, and other items.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.en:
Antonia, 62 years old, lives in Tudela, Misamis Occidental, with her husband and four children. Her husband is a motorcycle driver. Unable to support the family on her husband’s income alone, she has found a way to earn an income through snack and food vending. She began by selling a small amount of viands and snacks to her neighbors. 

Antonia later joined Paglaum Cooperative, which helped her to capitalize a sari-sari (small grocery store) in January of 2005. She became a member and has received several loans already. She has now applied for a PHP 13,000 loan to buy more stock. She hopes that her business will grow and someday become a mini-grocery.

loans.use: to buy more stock.

loans.name: Eulalia

texts.en:
Eulalia is from Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is a widow with six adult children. Farming is the main source of her income. As a farmer, she has always experienced hardships, especially in raising her family and providing for it. 

Eulalia found the right place for needed working capital when she joined PMPC. She has now requested a loan of PHP 14,900 to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer. This support will help her increase her income. Eulalia is always looking forward to better business opportunities and would love to be in a position to help others.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer

loans.name: Eufemia

texts.en:
Eufemia is 59 years old and lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She is a widow with four adult children. She had managed a lechon house (roasted pig) business for six years. Through this business she has helped her children finish their studies. 

Eufemia has now requested a loan to buy wood and seasonings. She has been a member of PMPC for 5 years. In the future, she wants to open a new lechon house in the city.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her lechon (roasted pig) business.

loans.name: Darly Yaneth

texts.es:
Darly una joven de 26 años carismática, divertida, con muchos ánimos y ganas de progresar, ella quiere estudiar para ser alguien en la vida, pero es muy consciente de que es una mujer humilde, y tiene que trabajar para pagarse el estudio, está realmente enamorada pero no de un hombre de su pequeño hijo que tiene 5 meses de nacido, ella quiere iniciar un negocio que será venta de dulces, galletería, y venta de café, perico y tinto.
Por esta razón pensando en generar sustento para su hija, pensando en estudiar en salir adelante solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido en dulces, chocolates, galletas, comprar una cafetera, utensilios, vasos para servir café, una carreta e iniciar con su actividad económica lo más rápido que pueda.
texts.en:
Darly, 26 years old, is a charismatic, fun young woman with lots of energy and a desire to progress. She wants to study in order to be someone in life, but is well aware that she is a humble woman and has to work to pay for those studies. Currently, she is in love – not with a man – but her young child who is 5 months old. 

She wants to start a business that will sell sweets, cookies and varieties of coffee. Hoping to provide a livelihood for her child and to study to advance in life, she is requesting a loan to buy an assortment of sweets, chocolates and cookies; a coffeemaker; utensils; coffee cups; and a cart – and to start her business as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of sweets, chocolates, cookies, a coffeemaker, utensils, glasses and a cart.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is a widow who has a used clothing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years and works hard to support her family. 

Marilyn has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more used clothing to sell to her customers. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell.

loans.name: Akou

texts.fr: Akou vit à Adidogomé aves ses deux enfants à sa charge. Elle est une femme mariée et âgée de 30ans. Pour mieux subvenir aux besoins quotidiens qu’elle éprouve, Akou vend du riz de bonne qualité afin d’avoir un revenu leur permettant de se nourrir. Akou s’approvisionne  trois fois par mois au marché de Kovié afin de vendre efficacement ses bols de riz. Akou demande ce crédit pour acheter de nouveaux sacs riz d’où elle peut tirer du bénéfice pour relever ses défis et étendre son commerce.
texts.en: Akou lives in Adidogomé with her two children. She is a married woman of 30 years. To better meet her daily financial needs, Akou sells high-quality rice in order to earn an income with which to feed her family. Akou restocks three times a month at market in Kovié in order to sell her bowls of rice effectively. Akou is asking for this loan to buy new bags of rice so that she can earn the profits she needs to face her challenges and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy two bags of rice.

loans.name: Renee

texts.es:
Renee, de 51 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica al comercio de mariscos y carne de cerdo, tienen cinco hijos, de los cuales solo tres viven con ellos, los otros dos ya tienen su propia familia.

Renee, se dedica a la compra y venta de cerdos desde hace 18 años, antes se dedicaba a la  agricultura y tenia molino, pero un amigo lo motivo a que iniciara en el negocio de la venta de cerdos porque era rentable, fue por esa razón que decidió ingresar a este negocio.- Para salir a comprar cerdos lo hace a pie, ya que no cuenta con un medio de transporte, paga transporte para poder llevarlos, algunas veces los destazan para venderlos por libras en la casa, sus hijas le ayudan en la venta y siempre se levantan a las 4:00 a.m. para vender y terminan a las 11:00 a.m.

El crédito lo utilizara para comprar cerdos, para aumentar sus ganancias y tambien va a invertir en la compra de mariscos para que su pareja los venda.

Sus sueños son seguir ayudando a sus hijas en el estudio, hasta que sean profesionales. También tiene el deseo de comprar un terreno para construir una casa digna.
texts.en:
Renee is 51 years old. He has studied through second grade. He is in a relationship, and his partner is dedicated to the shellfish and pig meat business. They have five children, of whom only three live with them. The other two children already have their own families.

Renee has been dedicated to buying and selling pigs for 18 years. Before that he was dedicated to agriculture and had a mill, but a friend encouraged him to start the business selling pigs because it was profitable. It was because of this that he decided to start this business. He goes by foot to buy the pigs, since he doesn’t have another mode of transportation. He pays for transportation to bring the pigs. He sometimes butchers the pigs to sell them by the pound in his house. His daughters help him in selling; they always wake up at 4:00am to sell, and they finish at 11:00am.

The loan will be used to buy pigs, to increase his earnings, and to invest in buying seafood so that his partner can sell them.

His dreams are to continue helping his children in their education, until they are professionals. He also wants to buy land to build a dignified house.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Tomás Eliceo

texts.es:
Tomás es un hombre de 38 años de edad es casado tienen una linda familia de 3 hijos de las edades de entre 3 y 13 años vive en una comunidad de Santa Lucia Utatlán.
Tomás es un padre de familia muy trabajador y para generar sus ingresos y mantener a su familia él se dedica a prestar servicios de trasporte a la gente de su comunidad, el realiza esta actividad desde hace 2 años, pero Tomás pensado en la prosperidad de su familia ha decido ahora comprar una línea de moto taxi  para poder obtener más ingresos, pero Tomás tiene un problema de que no cuenta con el dinero suficiente dinero para poder comprarlo, el junto a su esposa a decidido realizar un préstamo que lo utilizará para comprar esa línea de moto taxi e incrementar su negocio.
El sueño de Tomás es poder optar a este crédito para realizar la inversión con un nuevo moto taxi y así él pueda mejorar sus ingresos para seguir ayudando a sus hijos e la escuela.
texts.en:
Tomás, age 38, is married and has a beautiful family with three children between the ages of 3 and 13.  He lives in a community in Santa Lucia Utatlán.

Tomás is a very hard-working father.  In order to generate earnings and support his family, he provides transportation services to the people in his community.  He has been engaged in this business activity for two years.

However, thinking about his family's well-being, Tomás has decided to now buy a ‘moto taxi’ [three wheeled motorized vehicle] line in order to be able to get more income.  However, Tomás has a problem in that he does not have enough money to be able to buy it.  

Together with his wife, he has decided to get a loan.  He will use the loan to buy this moto taxi line and increase his business.

The dream that Tomás has is to be able to have this loan in order to make the investment and buy a new moto taxi.  This way he will be able to improve his earnings in order to continue helping his children with school.

loans.use: to buy a moto taxi line.

loans.name: Luz Edilma

texts.es:
Luz Edilma es una mujer de 59 años de edad, emprendedora y que siente una enorme felicidad al saber que una entidad va confiar en ella, apoyarla y guiarla para tener su propio negocio el cual será una heladería, como se puede apreciar poco a poco va formando su negocio, tiene un congelador, sillas y lo más importante un local, pero para terminar su negocio aún le falta invertir algo de capital, ella antes no había querido buscar ayuda debido a que las personas que le iban a prestar dinero no son oficiales y le cobran una cuota de interés bastante alta, pero al encontrarse con interactuar tiene la posibilidad y la tranquilidad de estar en una entidad justa y que solo busca ayudarla. 
Luz Edilma es madre de 2 hijos y es la necesidad económica la que la llevo a tomar la decisión de montar la heladería. 
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de sillas, surtido de sabores de helados, crema chantilly, salsa, crispí, conchas, mandar hacer la publicidad, las cartas, los implementos, los utensilios etc.
texts.en:
Luz Edilma is a 59 year old woman, entrepreneurial, and feels an enormous happiness to know that other people are going to have confidence in her, support her, and guide her in having her own business, which will be an ice cream shop. One can see her little by little building up her shop: she has a freezer, chairs, and the most important, a stall, although in order to finish, she still needs to invest capital. Previoiusly, she hadn't wanted to look for help since the people who came to lend her money aren't official and they collect a pretty high interest. But on finding Interactuar, she has the possibility and tranquility of being with an entity that is just and only wants to help her.

Luz Edilma is the mother of two children, and made the decision to stat an ice cream shop because of economic necessity.

She asks for a loan in order to buy chairs, a variety of ice cream flavors, chantilly cream, salsa, crispí, bread, cards, implements, utensils, and to send advertising.

loans.use: to buy chairs, ice cream flavors, chantilly cream, salsa, crispí, bread, cards, tools, utensils, and to advertise.

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr: Yawa habite à Kohé aves ses deux enfants à charge. Elle est une femme mariée et âgée de 50ans. Pour subvenir favorablement aux besoins quotidiens de sa famille, Yawa vend du gari préparé à l’aide du manioc pour faire la farine. Cette activité lui permet  d’avoir un revenu leur permettant de se nourrir. Yawa s’approvisionne  deux  fois par mois au marché de Noépé. Yawa demande ce crédit pour acheter de nouveaux sacs de gari d’où elle peut tirer du bénéfice pour assurer l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en: Yawa lives in Kohé with her two children. She is a married woman and is 50 years old. In order to favorably fulfill her family's daily needs, Yawa sells garri prepared with the help of manioc to make flour. This business allows her to have an income to feed herself. Yawa stocks up twice a month at the market in  Noépé. Yawa is asking for this loan to buy new bags of garri from which she will make a profit to ensure an education for her children.

loans.use: to buy 6 bags of garri.

loans.name: Paula Vicenta

texts.es:
Paula tiene 34 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus cuatro hijos en el distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercio de animales menores como cerdos, gallinas, patos, entre otros, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de sus vecinos. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales así como alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos, con esto Paula espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ventas y le permitirá tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Paula is 34 years old. She lives with her partner and their four children in the District of Pucará in Jaén Province. This community is located in the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru. The residents of this district engage in agriculture, trade, and raising animals.

Paula raises and sells small animals such as pigs, chickens, ducks, and other livestock. She has experience in this business and very good personal and work-related references that her neighbors have given on her behalf. Her loan will be used to buy a large quantity of animals, as well as balanced feed for fattening them. As a result, Paula hopes to offer a wider variety of animals to her customers. This will have a positive impact on her sales levels and would allow her to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of animals, as well as balanced feed for fattening them.

loans.name: Wilver Ernesto

texts.es:
Wilver, de 27 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, está acompañado, su pareja realiza los quehaceres del hogar y no tienen hijos, vive con sus padres, sin embargo no depende económicamente de ellos. 

Wilver, trabaja en la agricultura desde los 13 años, gracias a su padre aprendió a realizar este trabajo, ya que fue él quien le enseño.- Hace 5 años también inicio a trabajar en albañilería; actualmente siembra 14,000 metros cuadrados de cultivo de maíz y su pareja se involucra en la siembra de estos cultivos.

El crédito será invertido para comprar insumos agrícolas y pagar el arrendamiento del terreno donde cultivan. De esta forma Wilver podrá realizar la siembra de dicho cultivo.

El sueño de Wilver es tener su propio terreno, donde pueda construir su vivienda. Además le gustaría tener ganado y de esta forma diversificar sus fuentes de ingreso.
texts.en:
Wilver, 27 years old, studied until the fifth grade. He is married. His wife does the household duties and they do not have children. He lives with his parents, however he does not depend on them financially.

Wilver has worked in agriculture since he was 13 years old. Thanks to his father he learned how to do this work, since it was he who taught him. Also, five years ago he started to work in construction. Currently he plants 14,000 square meters of corn and his wife gets involved in the planting of these crops.

The loan will be invested to buy agricultural supplies and pay the rent for the land where they grow. In this way, Wilver will be able to carry out the planting of this crop.

Wilver’s dream is to have his own land where he can build a home. In addition, he would like to have cattle and in this way diversify his sources of income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pay the rent for the land where he grows.

loans.name: Luz Mary

texts.es:
Luz Mary tiene un negocio de cría y levante de aves, en su inventario están gallinas ponedoras, pollos y un gallo que se puede apreciar en la foto, es madre de un adolecente de 19 años de edad y junto con su esposo batallan por tener una mejor calidad de vida, pues la fuerte competencia que hay en el sector hacen que cada vez sean menso los ingresos que entren. 
Las personas de vereda se enfrentan a diferentes problemáticas como lo son los altos costos de insumos, el desplazamiento para conseguirlos, pero su preocupación pasa por conseguir clientes.
Luz Mary quiere solicitar un préstamo para el arreglo de sus galpones, compra de pollos y gallinas ponedoras, con la esperanza de poder alcanzar la meta de producción para convertirse en la proveedora de grandes empresas que les compran a las personas del campo.
texts.en:
Luz Mary has a poultry farming business. Her inventory includes laying hens, chickens, and a rooster that can be seen in the photo. 

She is the mother of an adolescent, age 19.  She and her husband fight to have a better quality of life, as fierce competition in the sector is reducing their income more and more.

The people of Vereda face different problems such as the high cost of supplies and the long journey to obtain them, but her main concern is getting customers.

Luz Mary wants to request a loan for repairing her coops and purchasing chickens and laying hens, in the hope of being able to reach the level of production needed to become a supplier to the big companies that purchase from people in the countryside.

loans.use: to repair her coops, and purchase chickens and laying hens.

loans.name: Gladys Salome

texts.es: Gladys tiene 51 años de edad es casada tiene 4 hijos vive en Guaranda provincia de Bolivar en la comunidad Chalata Reiloma, pertenece a la ventanilla rural Los Emprendedores Bolivarenses, Ella se dedica a la agricultura solicita el crédito para la compra de cerdos para criarlos y engordarlos para luego vender para mejorar su economia ya que tiene 4 hijos que mantener, gracias al crédito podra aumentar sus animalitos y podra comercializar, los desafios a los que se enfremnta es la falta de oportunidades, en su tiempo libre le gusta salir de viaje con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Gladys is 51 years old, married, and has four children. She lives in Guaranda, in the province of Bolivar, in the community of Chalata Reiloma. She belongs to the communial bank Los Emprendedores Bolivarenses [The Entrepreneurial Bolivarians].

She makes her living in agriculture. She asks for this loan to buy pigs to raise, fatten, and later sell. She wants to improve her financial stability, since she has four children to raise. 

Thanks to the loan, she will be able to increase the number of her little animals and also commercialize. Her challenges are the lack of opportunities.

In her free time, she likes to go on trips with her children.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials and doors.

loans.name: Elsi Aracely

texts.es: Elsi, tiene 27 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su conyugue con quien tiene dos hijos y reside en  una aldea del municipio de San Francisco, Atlántida. En busca de ingresos estableció un negocio de cría y engorde de pollos para vender la carne en  libras. Las ventas las realiza en la misma zona. Ella ha decidido solicitar un prestamo por 10,000 lempiras para comprar más pollos para cria y engorde y poder mantener una buena producción de carne. Su plan es ampliar y mejorar el negocio para que su familia tenga bienestar económico.
texts.en: Elsi, 27, lives in a common-law relationship with her partner, with whom she has two children, and she lives in a small village in San Francisco, Atlántida.  Looking for income, she established a business where she raises and fattens chickens, and sells the meat by the pound.  She conducts her sales in the same area. She has decided to request a loan for 10,000 lempiras to purchase more chickens to raise and fatten, and this will enable her to maintain a good meat production.  Her plan is to expand and improve the business so that her family has financial security.

loans.use: to purchase more chickens to raise and fatten, and sell the meat.

loans.name: Srey

texts.en:
Srey, age 34, lives in a community of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has three children who attend school. 

To make a living and support her the family, Srey manages and operates a farming business. She primarily grows and sells rice to the local dealer and customers in the market. She has been in this business for 20 years. On average, Srey earns $2.00 a day.

To supplement her income, Srey also raises and sells pigs. Currently, she lacks money to buy pig food. Therefore, she is applying for a KIVA loan to buy pig food. She is thankful to all the lenders for their financial support. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy pig food.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase shellfish for her business.

loans.name: Dionisia

texts.es:
Dionisia tiene 62 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos, vive en casa propia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. En este distrito la vida se desarrolla tranquilamente y los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral como cuyes, gallinas, patos, entre otros, hace 15 años se dedica a este negocio el cual se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio, cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Solicita préstamo para la compra de más cuyes, patos, gallina, pavos, entre otros animales para incrementar el stock de su negocio, el prestamo le ayudará para tener una mayor variedad de animales para ofrecer a sus clientes lo que tendrá un gran impacto en su nivel de ventas y le va a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dionisia, 62, is single and doesn’t have any children.  She lives in her own home in a rural area in the Oyotún district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region on Peru’s Northern Coast.  In this district, life unfolds peacefully, and the people are mainly engaged in farming and trade.

Dionisia is engaged in breeding and selling barnyard animals such as guinea pigs, chickens, ducks, and others.  For fifteen years, she has been engaged in this business, which is located in her home.  She has good personal and work references in the area.  She is requesting the loan to purchase more ducks, chickens, turkeys, and other animals to increase her business’s stock.  The loan will help to have a wider variety of animals to offer her customers, which will have a great impact on her sales levels, and permit her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more ducks, chickens, turkeys, and other animals to increase her business’s stock.

loans.name: Melchora

texts.es:
Melchora tiene 60 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hija en el distrito de Cayaltí, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña, arroz, y frutales, comercio y agricultura, a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú.

Ella tiene un pequeño negocio ubicado en su domicilio de crianza y venta de patos, cuyes y otras aves de corral, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y sus vecinos dan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales así como alimentos balanceados para el engorde de estos, de esta manera Melchora espera tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia y mejorando su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Melchora, 60, lives with her husband and daughter in the Cayaltí district, two hours from the city of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region, on Peru’s Northern Coast.  The people are engaged in trade, and farming where they cultivate sugar cane, rice, and fruit. Melchora has a small business located in her home where she raises and sells ducks, guineas pigs, and other poultry.  She has experience in this business, and her neighbors give her good personal and work references.  She has requested a loan to purchase more animals as well as balanced feed to fatten them.  In this way, Melchora hopes to have greater production to offer her customers, generate more income for her family, and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more animals as well as balanced feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Rosabella

texts.en:
Rosabella is 50 years old and married with six children.

She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Rosabella has been in this business for 10 years and also earns additional income from food vending. Rosabella is borrowing 11,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Omar

texts.es: Omar, hombre de 46 años  habita en un municipio área metropolitana de la ciudad,con su cónyuge y sus 4 hijos en las edades de 12 a 20 años; desde allí se dedica a la venta de pescado, aunque 4 años antes había adquirido la experiencia de comercializar este producto, pues su padre también trabajaba en lo mismo. Omar conoce las características de un pescado  fresco: tiene poco olor y ningún olor desagradable, su piel  escamosa debe tener sus escamas firmes sin desprenderse fácilmente y deben mostrarse brillantes, los ojos del pescado no deben estar enturbiados u opacos, así mismo el color de las agallas debe ser rojiso, y mantener el peritoneo  adherido al cuerpo sin desprenderse ni romperse fácilmente, todos estos son elementos que determinan la frescura del producto que vende Omar; quien trabaja de lunes a domingo desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche, con el fin de lograr metas como las de   mejorar la imagen del negocio y aumentar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Su desafío más importante es lograr fuentes de financiación, para mejorar sus inventarios, haciendo compras en mayor volumen, aunque en la actualidad ha solucionado este obstáculo, aplicando a un   credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará pescado bocachicos abierto y picado, mojarra y pargo etc. porque espera vender en esta temporada que es una de las que tiene picos altos y gana un poco más.
texts.en: Omar is a 46 year old man. He lives in a metropolitan area of the city with his spouse and their 4 children, aged 12 to 20. There he sells fish. He acquired experience selling this product 4 years ago. His father also did the same. Omar knows the characteristics of fresh fish: it has little odor and no bad odor. Its scaly skin must have firm scales that don't come off easily and they must be shiny. The fish' eyes must not be cloudy or opaque. Also, the color of the gils must be pinkish and the peritoneum should adhere to the body without breaking or detaching easily. All of these are elements that determine the freshness of the products that Omar sells. He works Monday through Sunday from 8 in the morning until 8 at night in order to achieve his goals such as improving the business' image and increasing his and his family's quality of life. His most important challenge is achieving financing sources to improve his inventory by buying in greater volumes. Right now he has resolves this obstacle, applying for a Kiva loan. This is the first loan he has taken out with the  Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With it he will buy gutted bocachicos, bream, snapper, etc. He hopes to sell them this season which is one that has high sales and he can earn a little more.

loans.use: to buy bocachicos, bream, snapper, etc.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is a married woman with four children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Editha is 42 years old.

Editha has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 2 years. Editha requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

In the future, Editha would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
Elvira is 52 years old and married with four children.

Elvira works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, condiments, groceries, etc.

Elvira has borrowed and repaid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has run her general store for seven years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Elvira aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, condiments, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Rocelyn

texts.en:
Rocelyn is 43 years old and has four children. Rocelyn is married and one child attends school.

Rocelyn has been in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines, for the past 15 years. She requested a PHP 21000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Rocelyn has has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her work.
